content.text: The repository open HdBA provides open access to the university's publications in full text and with a university bibliography. The publications are accessible to search engines, databases, and archiving institutions and can be reliably cited.

metadataPolicy.text: All bibliographic metadata provided via this interface, except abstracts, is hereby made available under CC0 license, free to share and re-use.

dataPolicy.text: The publications and electronic documents provided here must be used according to copyright laws, all rights reserved if not otherwise explicitly specified.

submissionPolicy.text: This repository is intended to hold Open Access publications.
